original_text: with a passageway in front of them. These were like the rooms on the north; they had the same length and width, with similar exits and dimensions. Similar to the doorways on the north
korean_text: 그 두 방 사이에 길이 있고 그 방들의 모양은 북쪽 방 같고 그 길이와 너비도 같으며 그 출입구와 문도 그와 같으며

sentences.original_text: with a passageway in front of them
These were like the rooms on the north
they had the same length and width
Similar to the doorways on the north
